des: "Extremely easy and quick pasta sauce recipe.  Use for cooked chicken or shrimp, too.  For a lower fat version, substitute half and half for the cream and add a teaspoon of cornstarch for thickening."
ins: In medium saucepan, cook white wine over high heat until reduced by half.  Add cream, reduce heat, and cook until reduced by one-third.  Add parmesan, gorgonzola and nutmeg.  Stir until cheeses melt and sauce is creamy.
